title: [Champion Concept] Locke, the Rune of the Light
body:
Hello again guys, sorry for the very long break. Here is another champion concept created by me, this time a support champion. Hope you like it and Riot takes a look at it !

Support Champion

Name: Locke, the Rune of the Light (Female and is pronounced “Lock”)
Type: Support
Health: 551 (+85 per level)
Health Regen: 5.6 (+0.7 per level)
Range: 475
Mana: 340 (+45 per level)
Mana Regen: 6.5 (+0.6 per level)
Attack Damage:  56 (+2.5 per level)
Attack speed:  0.66 (+1.60% per level)
Armour: 27.2 (+3.8)
Magic Resist: 30
Lane Played: AP Support

Passive: Enlightenment
Locke uses her power as the Runic Enhancer to increase an ally’s armour by a percentage of their attack damage and their magic resist by a percentage of their ability power permanently. (Similar to Kalista’s Black Spear).  Locke gains the same benefits however reversed with her gaining armour to her ability power and magic resist to her attack damage. 
Armour increase: 2/4/6/8/10/12/14/16/18% of attack damage
Magic Resist increase: 2/4/6/8/10/12/14/16/18% of ability power

Locke:
Armour increase: 2/4/6/8/10/12/14/16/18% of Locke’s ability power
Magic Resist: 2/4/6/8/10/12/14/16/18% of Locke’s attack damage

[Q] Runic Barrier
Locke uses the power of the runes to heal her ally/herself and then create a shield around them that lasts up to five seconds. 
Heal: 50/90/130/170/210 +60% AP
Shield: 70/130/190/250/310 +80% AP
Mana: 70/75/80/85/90
Cooldown: 11/10/9/8/7

[W] Rune Surge
Locke locks on to a target champion and fires a bolt of pure runic energy marking them for six seconds. If an allied champion attacks the marked champion, the mark bursts and the allied champion gains a small boost of speed for two seconds.
Damage: 70/100/130/160/190 +50% AP
Mana: 30/35/40/45/50
Cooldown: 6/5/4.5/4/3
Speed boost: 15/25/35/45/55

[E] Art of the Staff
Locke uses her practice of the staff to block a single ability. On second cast within three seconds, she pushes away all units in a cone away from her dealing magic damage.
Spell shield duration: 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds
Damage: 50/100/150/200/250 +50% AP
Cooldown: 13/12/11/10/9 seconds
Mana: 60 at all levels

[R] Ultimate: Power of the Light
Passive: All healing Locke receives and gives is increased by a percentage. Active:  Bestowed with her great power, Locke uses all her great power within her to strengthen her ally healing them and greatly increasing a variety of their stats for seven seconds but instantly halves Locke’s current health.
Healing percentage increase: 2/4/6% +3% AP
Heal:  100/200/300 +65% AP
Attack damage increase: 20/35/50 +60% AP
Ability Power increase: 20/35/50 +60% AP
Movement Speed increase: 20/30/40 +10% AP
Armour and Magic Resist increase: 10/15/20 +5% AP



Lore:
Locke was once a great staff wielding magi, one of the highest in an ancient order known as purely the Light. The Light existed as an order that used the power of runes and magical weapons such as a staff to further the world’s existence, sometimes saving the ancient world from epic beasts or even causing catastrophic events in order to preserve some. Locke, out of the entire order, was born with rich dark ebony hair. With her birth many elders questioned the appearance of such a peculiarity within the Light. However her mother, one of the high ranking elders, sought to solve that, by training her daughter in some of the most potent staff arts. Upon majoring in the art of healing, Locke’s mother saw her daughter as a dark horse of the Light and changed her mind in trying to convert her. With the surge of the Darkin Blade Aatrox, the Light sought to intervene to stop the massacre of the Magelords, however in rage and bloodlust, the Darkins themselves fought with the Light over a series of years with both races almost being obliterated. With the Darkin victories and Light defeats, they retreated back to their capital, the Darkin held no bars against the Light. They viciously tore through the city of mages. Realising their inevitable defeat, Locke’s mother sent her daughter down to the world they once protected to avoid a death by the Darkin. Sacrificing herself, Locke’s mother doomed the Darkin forces in the capital city, destroying it completely. Landing in a magical well of runes, Locke fell unconscious for centuries until she was awakened by the resurgence of the Darkin Blade Aatrox. Waking up, empowered by the runes that bathed her in their magic while she slept, she then sought out the Darkin Blade which eventually led her to the League.
“The Light will continue to shine.”
--Locke, the Rune of the Light 

Lines:
Selection: “Light shine bright.”
Movement:
“Towards the Light.”
“Magic and runes, guide me.”
“Staff, lead the way.”

Attacking:
“Blind them!”
“Light shine forth!”
“Runes empower me.”
“Burn away Darkin!” (Only if there is an enemy Aatrox)
“Let the Light reign!” (Only for Power of the Light)

Taunt:
“Let me enlighten you about where I came from.”
“I am delighted to show you my……”

Joke:
(Tries to conjure an orb of light) “Mother, why keep me in the dark?”
“It’s funny how you will go to the Light when you die.”
